import { Row, Col, Card, InputGroup, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faStoreAlt, faUserPlus, faCheckDouble, faDollarSign, faTachometerAlt, faEdit, faClock, faBan } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons'; import { faThumbsUp,} from '@fortawesome/free-regular-svg-icons'; import { faProductHunt } from '@fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons'; import CountUp from 'react-countup'; import GlobalStyleSheet from '../../../../../styleSheet' class VendorDashboard extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { noOfTtotalProducts: 1000, noOfInStockProducts: 2000, noOfSoldProducts: 3000, noOfReturnedProducts: 4000, totalEarnings: '', thisYearEarnings: '', thisMonthEarnings: '', thisWeekEarnings: '', noOfTotalOrders: '', noOfDeliveredOrders: '', noOfPendingOrders: '', noOfCancelledOrders: '', } } render() { return (

) } } const styles = { title_row: { borderBottom: '1px solid lightgray', padding: '1.5% 4%' }, title_fontawesome: { color: 'gray', marginRight: '3%', width: '26px', height: '26px', maxHeight: '26px', maxWidth: '26px', }, title:{ color: 'gray' }, row: { margin: '2%', padding: '0px' }, card_col: { padding: '3% 1%' }, card_header: { background: 'white', padding: '1.5% 5%', color: '#6A7074', // borderBottom: `0.5px solid ${GlobalStyleSheet.body_color}` fontSize: '16px' }, card_text_div: { color: '#6A7074', fontSize: '14px', padding: '5%', }, card_text_row_total_product: { display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', padding: '5%', background: 'blue', borderRadius: '5px' }, card_text_row_in_stock_product: { display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', padding: '5%', background: 'purple', borderRadius: '5px' }, card_text_row_sold_product: { display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', padding: '5%', background: 'green', borderRadius: '5px' }, card_text_row_returned_product: { display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', padding: '5%', background: 'red', borderRadius: '5px' }, product_fontawesome: { color: 'white', width: '30px', height: '30px', maxHeight: '30px', maxWidth: '30px', }, fontawesome: { color: `${GlobalStyleSheet.primry_color}`, width: '50px', height: '50px', maxHeight: '50px', maxWidth: '50px', float: 'right' }, } export default VendorDashboard;
